OnInventoryClick.Description: Called whenever a player clicks in an inventory

Player.Description: The player who interacted with the inventory

GetClickedInventory.Description: Returns the inventory that the click was in

GetSlotItem.Description: Returns the item in the clicked slot

GetCursorItem.Description: Returns the item in the cursor

GetHotbarbutton.Description: Returns the hotbar button that was pressed

GetSlot.Description: Returns the slot that was clicked

GetTitle.Description: Returns the title of the inventory

IsLeftClick.Description: Returns whether the click type was LeftClick

IsRightClick.Description: Returns whether the click type was RightClick

IsShiftRightClick.Description: Returns whether the click type was ShiftRightClick

ShouldInteract.Description: Set whether the player should be able to interact with the inventory
